Court
Application for Copy of Driving Record

Compliance Dismissal

Deferred Disposition

Driving Safety Request   Send all mail to Talty Municipal Court, 9700 CR 213, Talty TX 75126
Municipal Court Procedures
Payments Online: www.trafficpayment.com                        Payments By Phone: (800) 444-1187

To contact the Talty Municipal Court office, email courtclerk@taltytexas.com or call 972-552-9487.  
The office will move to its new location on June 3, 2024.   

Location:  Court is also held at 9700 CR 213, Talty TX 75126

Violators have twenty (20) days from the date of the ticket to enter a written plea.
The court accepts cash, money orders, credit cards and personal checks with proper identification. 

 

Please do not bring your children to court. 
DO NOT WEAR FLIP/FLOPS, SHORTS OR TANK TOPS AND DRESS RESPECTFULLY.
Defendants may contact the court between 8 am and 12 pm, Monday thru Friday to speak with the clerk regarding disposition options set out by the Judge.

Janice McKee        Municipal Judge
Nancy Sanford Court Clerk


BEFORE LEAVING FOR COURT, CALL THE MUNICIPAL COURT OFFICE TO CONFIRM
THE TIME AND PLACE.




City of Talty, Texas  |  9700 CR 213, Forney TX 75126   |   Phone: 972.552.9592
